1314070.name: NEKOKORO ~Last Chance~
1314070.description:
*The project has been cancelled*


One day, Dave's life turned upside-down thanks to unexpected, cute, and fluffy roommates!

Not only are they catgirls, but also shapeshifting beings from space!
Forced to leave their planet, the two friends find shelter on Earth.

Meet the cheerful Acacia, the confident Lavender, and a few more characters!

What will happen now?
How will they change Dave's daily life?

Find out in this lighthearted romance Visual Novel intertwined with comedy, a bit of drama, science-fiction, and fantasy!

Game features:

  • Adorable and fluffy catgirls!
  • Two different character stories!
  • Partially animated characters and backgrounds!
  • Pleasant and relaxing music!
  • Overflowing cuteness additionally coated in sugar!
  • About 3-4 hours of content!

Playing the first NEKOKORO is not required, but highly recommended
